about_the_game:
PLEASE NOTE: This game REQUIRES an internet connection and a connection to Twitch to operate. It is a game meant for streamers to use while they broadcast, and is not meant to be played in a single-player mode. That said...

Are you a Twitch streamer looking for something fun and unique to add to your stream? Well then... welcome to Micro Stream RPG! It's a tiny, auto-play RPG that your viewers can engage with while you focus on streaming.

How does it work? After a quick connection process, simply run Micro Stream RPG in the background. During your stream, people hanging out can use a chat command (e.g. "!rpg") to activate Micro Stream RPG, putting them into a mini auto-play adventure.

Each time they play, chatters will face enemies one after another. Defeating monsters lets the player earn EXP, level up, and progress through the dungeon until they finally face off against a powerful boss. Once the boss is defeated, the user acquires a medal and advances to the next dungeon to face new, more powerful enemies. If a player runs out of HP, their character's attempt will be over. However, they keep all gold and EXP they earned along the way, enabling them to progress farther the next time they play!

Micro Stream RPG takes care of all this for you - no input needed! Not only that, but Micro Stream RPG offers a plethora of customization options that allow you the freedom to implement the game however you want into your own streaming environment, including:

- Setting various window sizes, and remembering the application's screen position

- Chroma color and game color options to style the game to fit your stream

- Game speed option to accelerate the action

- Queue limits and user entry thresholds to let everyone have a chance to play

- Custom engagement messages

- The ability to lock out new entries from chat, for when you're trying to end your stream

It's simple for you, and it's exciting for your chat to go on their own little adventures! So, if you're ready for something new, dynamic, and unique to add to your streams, give Micro Stream RPG a chance! You never know what adventures might await you and your viewers!
detailed_description:
Roadmap

Micro Stream RPG is planned to launch early 2025. The game will hopefully release with a minimum of 5 and more dungeons will be added over time as free content updates. No DLC required. Holiday and timed event dungeons will also release in the future, and players can earn special badges for completing these areas.
